VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AstraCorp relative to Ironclad Industries?
SRP.A: AstraCorp is {below} Ironclad Industries in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironclad Industries}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Skyward Systems}.

VE.Q: What is Ironclad Industries's Turnover Rate in 1984?
VE.A: Ironclad Industries's turnover rate in 1984 is {21.76} %.

VE.Q: What is Zenith Enterprises's Turnover Rate in 1981?
VE.A: Zenith Enterprises's turnover rate in 1981 is {17.02} %.

VE.Q: What is Ironclad Industries's Turnover Rate in 1981?
VE.A: Ironclad Industries's turnover rate in 1981 is {17.07} %.

VE.Q: What are the turnover rate of Ironclad Industries, Verdant Ventures, and Skyward Systems in 1983?
VE.A: Ironclad Industries's turnover rate is {19.46} %, Verdant Ventures's turnover rate is {17.34} %, Skyward Systems's turnover rate is {10.62} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Turnover Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum turnover rate is {9.57} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Turnover Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum turnover rate is {21.76} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Turnover Rate level recorded for AstraCorp?
What is the lowest Turnover Rate level recorded for AstraCorp?
EVJ.A: AstraCorp's lowest recorded level is approximately {12.78} % in {1984}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Turnover Rate?
SC.A: The average total turnover rate is {91.90} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Turnover Rate go below 90.23 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Turnover Rate exceed 93.16 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1983, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 1980 and 1981?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between 1982 and 1983 was {higher} than between 1980 and 1981.

NC.Q: Was the total Turnover Rate in 1981 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total turnover rate in 1981 was {lower} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1984, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 1982 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between 1983 and 1984 was {higher} than between 1982 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1983, did the total Turnover Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1980 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total turnover rate between 1981 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1980 and 1982.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Ironclad Industries} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Skyward Systems, AstraCorp, Meridian Dynamics, Verdant Ventures, Zenith Enterprises, Ironclad Industries}.
